pageProduct.name: Alkira Brightening Antioxidant Night Cream 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

“Of all the products I’ve formulated over my long career in skin care, this is by far my favourite” Alison Goodger, founder Alkira.” Our super charged antioxidant night cream is a luxurious, buttery cream enriched with wrinkle rewinders, complexion brighteners, elasticity enhancers, antioxidants and powerful plant actives.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Contains one of the world’s richest sources of vitamin C, Kakadu Plum paired with Quandong and Finger Lime Caviar to break down pigmentation and promote a radiant complexion. • Citric acids to encourage skin rejuvenation, to help inhibit the appearance of pigmented spots and to unclog pores • Complexion correcting and brightening Carrot, Turmeric and Rosehip • Antioxidant rich super fruits of Pomegranate and Acai to help slow signs of oxidative stress while promoting firmness. • A plant active hydrating combination of Macadamia, Cocoa and Sesame and Aloe Vera to leave skin soft

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Ceteareth-20, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai Palm) Fruit Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Fruit Extract, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract, Citrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Beta-Carotene (CI 75130) Limonene*

Directions

After cleansing at night, gently massage into face, neck and décolletage
